short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create your ideal class schedule conveniently

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helps you create your ideal class schedule without having to deal with clunky webreg.
Easily build and modify your schedule through a clean interface. You can drag and drop course sections on the calendar to schedule with ease, and save multiple schedules that you can quickly switch between. Your schedule from this extension can be sent to webreg with one click under the "Connect to USC" tab.


Calendar icon by Freepik - https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/calendar_591607.
